abstract.displayForm: This manuscript contains the Sanskrit commentary, called Janahitā, on the Daśāśrutaskandhasūtra, the fourth Chedasūtra belonging to the Śvetāmbara canon. According to the NCC, this commentary was composed by Brahmamuni , alias Vinayadeva , pupil of Pārśvacandra of the Tapāgaccha, in 1543 A.D. The text comprises the pratīkas of the mūla text in Ardhamāgadhī Prakrit which are followed by the commentary in Sanskrit directly. It is divided into ten chapters corresponding to the Daśāśrutaskandhasūtra dealing with the rules of monastic life, the 30 types of karma that deceives the self and the striving after worldly gains at the time of death (nidāna). The text ends abruptly in chapter ten and the commentary on the famous 8th chapter, the Kalpasūtra, is wanting.
abstract.label: Abstract

material.displayForm:
Paper.

Folio height: 12.2 cm, width: 25.3 cm.
material.label: Material

extent.displayForm: 69 ff. (70 missing according to LVP Add. 1809)
extent.label: Extent

foliation.displayForm:
1. Original: Jaina Devanāgarī numerals, bottom right margin

2. Original: Jaina Devanāgarī numerals, top left margin, beneath the running title and the chapter number
foliation.label: Foliation

value.displayForm:
Written height: 9 cm, width: 19.3 cm.

14 lines per page, approximately 41 akṣaras per line.

Akṣara height: 3.5 mm. Interlinear space height: 2 mm.
Commentary form: Sūḍha. The commentary follows the pratīkas directly.

One outer marginal frame line and triple marginal frame lines in red ink. Initial homage, pratīkas, rubrics and marginal title are highlighted with red pigment. Deletions are made with a covering of yellow paste.
Jaina Devanāgarī in black ink.

Marginalia

Running title (daśāśru|sū|vṛ or daśā|sū|vṛ), top left margin, verso, above the folio number. The chapter number is given above.
Bought in Bikaner by Prof. G. Bühler in 1875.

Descriptions of the manuscript

List of Oriental MSS. Class Catalogue of Oriental MSS. (Cambridge: 1900–).
LVP = de La Vallée Poussin, Louis and Caroline Mary Ridding, U[niversity.L[ibrary].C[ambridge]. Catalogue of Sanskrit MSS [unpublished card catalogue] (Cambridge: 1916).

Manuscripts

Pune, Government Manuscripts Library: BORI 17.2, No. 492-493.
NCC 8, p. 364.
Velankar 1944: p. 172.

Edition(s)

This text seems to be still unpublished.

Secondary Literature

Kapadia, Hiralal R., BORI = Descriptive catalogue of the government collections of manuscripts, 17,2, Jaina literature and philosophy. Part II, (a) Āgamika literature (Bombay: Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute, 1936).
Raghavan, Venkatarama (ed.), NCC = New catalogus catalogorum: an alphabetical register of Sanskrit and allied works and authors, Madras University Sanskrit series (Madras: University of Madras, 1947-).
Velankar, Hari D. (ed.), Jinaratnakosa: an alphabetical register of Jain works and authors : Vol. I. works, Government oriental series C ; 4 (Poona: Bhandarkar Oriental Research Institute, 1944).

Rubric: [1v1] || ℔ || Oṃ namaḥ || śrīśāradāyai namaḥ ||
Incipit: [1v1] yathāsthitāśeṣāpadārthasārthakramārthasaṃdhānavidhipravīṇaṃ jinaṃ janānaṃda[1v2]karaṃ kṛpābdhi(!) namāmi bhavyāṃbujabodhasūraṃ 1 stumo mahāvīrajinasya tejo bhavākhyanīrākarapāragamya anādi[1v3]duḥkarmagaṇasya nityaṃ nṛṇāyitaṃ yatra sukhāyam eva 2
Final Rubric, section: [8v1] || iti brahmaviracitāyāṃ janahitāyāṃ śrīdaśāśrutaskaṃ¦[8v2]dhaṭīkāyā(!) samādhisthānanāmakaṃ prathamaṃ adhyayanaṃ samāptaṃ || 1 ||
Final Rubric, section: [10v1] || iti śrībrahmaviracitāyāṃ daśāśrutaskaṃdhaṭīkāyāṃ bala¦[10v2]nāmakaṃ dvitīyam adhyayanaṃ samāptaṃ || 2 ||
Final Rubric, section: [13r3] || iti śrīdaśāśrutaskaṃdhaṭīkā āśātanānāmakaṃ tṛtīyam adhya[13r4]yanaṃ samāptam || 3 ||
Final Rubric, section: [21v13] || iti śrībrahmaviracitāyāṃ śrīdaśāśruta¦¦[21v14]skaṃdhaṭīkāyāṃ gaṇisaṃpannāmakaṃ caturtham adhyayanaṃ samāptam || 4 ||
Final Rubric, section: [26v11] iti cittasamādhisthānākhyaṃ paṃcamam adhyayana〚hī〛ṭīkāsamāptam [26v12] || vyākhyātaṃ daśacittasamādhisthānākhyaṃ paṃcamam adhyayanam || 5 ||
Final Rubric, section: [38r9] ity ekādaśopāsakapratimākhyaṃ ṣaṣṭam adhyayanaṃ samāptam || || vyākhyātaṃ ṣaṣṭam adhyayanaṃ || 6 ||
Final Rubric, section: [43v12] iti brahmaviracitāyāṃ śrīda[43v13]sā(!)śrutaskaṃdhaṭīkāyāṃ dvādaśabhikṣupratimākhyaṃ saptamam adhyayanaṃ samāptaṃ || cha || vyākhyātaṃ sa[43v14]ptamam adhyayanaṃ || 7 ||
Final Rubric, section: [44r12] kalpākhyaṃ aṣṭam a[44r13]dhyayanaṃ 8
Final Rubric, section: [50v2] iti śrībrahmaviracitāyāṃ janahitāyāṃ ¦¦ [50v3] śrīdaśāśrutaskaṃdhaṭīkāyāṃ navamam adhyayanaṃ samāptam || 9 ||
Explicit: [69v12] aṇaṃte ityādi anaṃtam anaṃtārthaviṣayatvāt yadvā (?) anaṃtam aṃtarahitam aparyavasitatvāt [69v13] anuttaraṃ sarvottamatvāt nirvyāghātaṃ kaḍakumyādyapratihatvāt (?) nirāvaraṇaṃ kṣāyikatvāt kṛtsraṃ sa[69v14]kalārthagrāhakatvāt pratipūrṇṇaṃ sakalasvāṃśasamanvitatvāt rākācaṃdravat kevalam asahāyaṃ ata e///
